summary: Karin the Redguard, is warrior who specializes in sword and shield combat, who can also heal herself and allies.
descriptionHtml: Karin the Redguard, is warrior who specializes in sword and shield combat, in addition to her melee capabilities, she also can use restoration to heal you or herself if need be. As of right now she is a simple companion, however if 10 people download this i will add a personal quest, extended dialogue, and voice acting.
author: D0minicz
